entry.title: Renaissance in ruins
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,179Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Stiles returns to Beacon Hills after years of disappearance. He brings with him a child, but something is different. His presence is marked by a silent pain, a weight that the pack can't ignore.Derek quickly notices that Stiles is no longer the same. There‚Äôs something in his behavior, in his gaze, that hides a dark past. But what happened to him? What is he trying to hide?The pack, still hurt by Stiles' sudden departure, doesn‚Äôt know how to deal with his return. Stiles‚Äô secrets begin to surface, and with them, a truth no one expected.And, in the midst of it all, Derek starts to wonder: is what happened to Stiles something that can be healed? Or is he already lost forever?

entry.title: Waiting In The Wings
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,517Chapters: 6/7Kudos: 210

Summary: Melissa folded her arms and stared at Stiles, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm still having a hard time believing that Derek Hale, of all people, is your boyfriend now.‚Äù‚ÄúYep! Derek‚Äôs my boyfriend! We‚Äôre totally rocking the whole relationship thing. I mean, we‚Äôre no Scott and Allison when it comes to PDA, but we‚Äôre both very affectionate behind closed doors. It‚Äôs kind of hilarious actually, because some people think that Derek doesn‚Äôt even like me when we‚Äôre in public, just because he growls or glares at me from time to time. But we‚Äôre just a misunderstood couple, y‚Äôknow‚Ä¶ Kind of like other star-crossed lovers out there. We‚Äôre basically this generation‚Äôs Romeo and‚Ä¶ Miguel.‚ÄùMelissa was grinning so wide that her face almost hurt. Stiles had wildly overcompensated, and now she knew he was lying.‚ÄúIf you and Derek are boyfriends, you won‚Äôt have a problem inviting him over for dinner then.‚ÄùStiles malfunctioned for a full second before squawking like a dying bird, ‚ÄúDinner?!‚Äù

entry.title: Guided by a Beating Heart
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,598Chapters: 52/54Kudos: 62

Summary: (Further continuation of Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU)After defeating their second Goa'uld System Lord in less than a year, the residents of Beacon Hills must adapt to their ever-changing world.Cora Hale has broken the family curse, but now she must continue her work of rehabilitating the Hale-Littlefield Pack while keeping Beacon Hills safe for all its residents.Stiles Stilinski continues his journey of recovery and self-discovery after his possession.Derek Hale faces new challenges as he starts going on offworld missions through the Stargate.

entry.title: Sparked: Part 1
entry.summary:
Author: HitopCub

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 225,149Chapters: 17/44Kudos: 28

Summary: After The Alignment - a cosmic therapy session led by his and Derek's future son from an alternate reality - Stiles Stilinski's latent spark abilities are awakened. Now he's diving into his first six months of magical training with a prestigious coven, hidden on the 13th floor of a Silicon Valley tech giant.Stiles navigates a world where cutting-edge tech meets ancient magic. He's juggling unpredictable spark powers, bonding with fellow apprentices, and trying not to spill interdimensional secrets (like being married to Derek in another reality). Meanwhile, he's nurturing dreams of opening an apothecary in Beacon Hills.But it's not all cinnamon rolls and spell books. A sinister presence is sabotaging Stiles' training, and rumors of a spy threaten to tear the coven apart. Stiles must unravel these mysteries while mastering his abilities and grappling with growing feelings for Derek.With help from old and new friends, Stiles faces challenges that will shape his future as a spark. "Sparked: Part 1" is a tale of magic, mayhem, and coming-of-age, proving that in six months, anything can happen - especially when you're a spark-in-training with a knack for trouble and a head full of secrets.

entry.summary:
Author: Waddiwasii

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,725Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 58

Summary: It‚Äôs a tentative, fragile thing, what they have together. Nothing more than the bare bones of something that might, in a different world, be worth defining.Which means they fuck a lot, but not much else.Stiles is okay with it, but he also knows himself pretty well by now, and enforcing a clear divide between sex and feelings has never been his vibe. Derek, though‚ÄîDerek is skittish. A bunny-rabbit-heart beating fast, fast, fast beneath the sharp teeth and claws of a wolf‚Äôs costume.Stiles sees it, even if Derek pretends otherwise.But also:‚ÄúCan you give us, like, two minutes, tops?" Stiles asks, voice coming out a bit desperate. "Some of us didn‚Äôt get to orgasm, and I'm not naming any names here, but‚Äîyeah, okay, it‚Äôs me.‚ÄùHis dad exhales, tired and displeased, the kind of breath that usually comes right before he puts Stiles under strict house arrest."Hale," he says resolutely. "Get your goddamn ass off my kid."

Summary: Stiles' version of Beauty and the Beast began with a missing girl saved by a bite from a man that was both beauty and beast, and only got weirder from there. The trees and picture frames whisper to him, memories and power long forgotten are forced to the surface, and Stiles is somehow the key to breaking a six year old curse and reseeding magic in his fading town‚Ä¶ preferably before the enemy gets their hands on even more power‚Äîor his father. Which would be a lot easier if the people around him would stop getting so complicated.

entry.title: Habits Of My Heart
entry.summary:
Author: sunrue

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,052Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 391

Summary: "Stiles." His voice came out gruff, lower than usual, "If everything is too loud and you can't find a place to be safe,¬†come and find me. I will be your quiet."For once, Stiles had nothing to say. He felt his heart speed up, felt his mouth gaping like a fish. Derek's hand was still gripping his wrist - it felt like a lifeline. An anchor, keeping him grounded."I will." He replied eventually. He wasn't sure if he was intending to stick to that or not, but he vowed to at least try. "Thank you, Derek." They could both hear the words that were going unspoken, the 'and not just for the ride'. He didn't need to say it.--Or, the one where Derek Hale was suddenly everywhere, and Stiles was suddenly uncertain.

entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,699Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 853

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.
